CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_TH_GT_MSL_DISTRIBUTION (		--// CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_th_gt_msl_distribution (
    cntry_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    crncy_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    distributor_id varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    distributor_name varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    store_type_id varchar(20),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    store_type_name varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    store_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    store_name varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_rep_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_rep_name varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    category_code varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    category varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    brand_code varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    brand varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    barcode varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    product_description varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    survey_date date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    no_distribution varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    osa varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    oos varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    oos_reason varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    valid_flag text		--//  ENCODE raw
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_TH_GT_ROUTE (		--// CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_th_gt_route (
    cntry_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    crncy_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    store_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    routeno varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    distributor_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    ship_to varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    contact_person varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_name varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_description varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    isactive varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_rep_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    routecode varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_code_desc varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    valid_flag text,		--//  ENCODE raw
    route_detail_flag varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    effective_start_date date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    effective_end_date date		--//  ENCODE raw
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_TH_GT_SALES_ORDER (		--// CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_th_gt_sales_order (
    cntry_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    crncy_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    distributor_id varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_order_no varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_order_date date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    store_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    store_name varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    city varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    region varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    saledistrict varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    saleoffice varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    salegroup varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    customertype varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    storetype varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    saletype varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_rep_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_rep_name varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    product_code varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    productname varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    megabrand varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    brand varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    baseproduct varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    variant varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    putup varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    priceref numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    backlog numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    qty numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    subamt1 numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    discount numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    subamt2 numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    discountbtline numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    totalbeforevat numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    total numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    sales_order_line_no varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    cancelled varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    documentid varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    return_reason varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    promotioncode varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    promotioncode1 varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    promotioncode2 varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    promotioncode3 varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    promotioncode4 varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    promotioncode5 varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    promotion_code varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    promotion_code2 varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    promotion_code3 varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    avgdiscount numeric(18,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    ordertype varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    approverstatus varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    pricelevel varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    optional date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    deliverydate date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    ordertime varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    shipto varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    billto varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    deliveryrouteid varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    approved_date date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    approved_time varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    invoice_no varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    paymenttype varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    load_flag varchar(2),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    valid_flag text		--//  ENCODE raw
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_TH_GT_SCHEDULE (		--// CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_th_gt_schedule (
    cntry_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    crncy_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_rep_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    schedule_date date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    approved varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    distributor_id varchar(50)		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_TH_GT_VISIT (		--// CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_th_gt_visit (
    cntry_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    crncy_cd varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_rep_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_rep_name varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    store_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    store_name varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    visit_date_planned date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    time_plan varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    actual_date_visited date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    time_visit_in varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    object varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    visit_end date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    time_visit_out varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    regioncode varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    areacode varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    branchcode varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    distributor_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    time_survey_in varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    time_survey_out varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    count_survey varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    valid_flag text		--//  ENCODE raw
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;
